biotools.summary: CHOP takes a protein sequence as input, and returns a list of protein sequence fragments with homology to PDB and Pfam domains and to proteins from the SWISS-PROT database.

bioschemas.name: CHOP
bioschemas.summary: CHOP takes a protein sequence as input, and returns a list of protein sequence fragments with homology to PDB and Pfam domains and to proteins from the SWISS-PROT database.
